sentences.en: A fixed or invariable value, parameter or data item.
sentences.cn: 一种固定的或不可变的值 、 参数或数据项.

sentences.en: Certainly, more scolds the fire, is still the screen invariable truth.
sentences.cn: 当然, 越骂越火, 依然是荧屏不变的真理.

sentences.en: Cowboys invariable promise you the earth for a ￡1.
sentences.cn: 但是这样的设计者总是给你太多的承诺,却总是做不到.

sentences.en: Good quality and reasonable price are always our invariable preferences for customers.
sentences.cn: 质量好、公道的价格是本公司多年经营的理念.

sentences.en: He came to see me with the invariable request for a loan.
sentences.cn: 他来见我时又提出了他那一贯的借钱的要求.
她的日常生活总是千篇一律。
他永远保持谦恭的态度.

sentences.en: His invariable answer was ‘Wait and see.’
sentences.cn: 他的回答总是那句话:“等着瞧吧。”

sentences.en: Individual housing common reserve fund rate on loan maintains invariable.
sentences.cn: 个人住房公积金贷款利率保持不变.

sentences.en: It is an invariable fact that spring follows winter.
sentences.cn: 冬天过后是春天,这是不变的事实.

sentences.en: It is an invariable rule of auto design and engineering: Cars get bigger with age.
sentences.cn: 汽车设计与工程领域里有条不变的法则：越是新出的车越大。

sentences.en: Our history also advances by these truth, is through ancient times invariable.
sentences.cn: 我们的历史亦由这些真理推进, 亘古不变.

sentences.en: Reduced vigor or " inbreeding depression " is not an invariable consequence of inbreeding.
sentences.cn: 降低生活力或 “ 近亲繁殖的衰退 ” 并不是近亲繁殖必然的后果.

sentences.en: The operation procedure and its execution are not invariable.
sentences.cn: 业务过程本身及其执行都不是一成不变的.

sentences.en: There's always, and I think this is nearly invariable -there's an element in Milton's similes that stands outside the framework of the basic comparison.
sentences.cn: 有一点是时常出现并且几乎不变的,-就是在弥尔顿的明喻中始终有一个元素,是从基本的对比框架中脱颖而出的。

sentences.en: This process, however, was not invariable.
sentences.cn: 但是, 这个过程并非始终不变.

sentences.en: Through 300 hour's running, the ability of incision keeps invariable.
sentences.cn: 通过300小时连续运行试验, 切割性能保持不变.

sentences.en: Why some human are invariable to the victims of the tsunami?
sentences.cn: 为啥对这次海啸受害者有些人却无动于衷?

words.tran_cn: [数] 不变量；[计] 不变式

trans.tran_cn: 恒定的，不变的，始终如一的
trans.tran_en: always happening in the same way, at the same time etc
